Replace.Text: Improvements build roads on surrounding tiles. Cities with [ICON_Governor] Governors generate +5% [ICON_Gold] Gold and have +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity per Governor title, and activating a [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant grants a free [ICON_Governor] Governor title.

Row.Text: Darius, your people look to you to once again bring back the days of power and glory for Persia! The empire of your ancestors must emerge again, to triumph over its foes and to bring peace and order to the world! O King of Kings, will you answer the call? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
Darius I
Darius the Great
By the grace of Ahuramazda am I king; Ahuramazda has granted me the kingdom.
Peace be upon you! I am Darius, the great and outstanding King of Kings of great Persia. But, of course, you must have known that already...
Come and marvel at the grandeur of the cities of Persia! I assure you: you've never seen anything like them before.
Agreed.
Persia has had many capitals in its time, so let me make sure your maps are up to date. I suppose I should figure out wherever it is you come from too...
Good day to you.
I accept the offerings of your envoys.
Your offerings would only pollute these sacred halls. I will not have it!
My diplomats bring you a sample of the fine textiles and carpets of Persia, as well as some of the new coins I had minted. They're called darics. Guess who they're named after. Go ahead, guess.
I shall permit your people entry into the land of Seven Climes. They shall be watched closely, however.
The lands of Persia are not open to those who are not worthy.
Persia is brimming with greatness. Allow us entry to your lands and perhaps some of it will rub off on you and your people.
I, Darius, King of Kings, accept this offer of friendship.
Tell me, do you imagine the lion to be friends with the mouse as well? Ha!
I, Darius, King of Kings, offer you my hand in friendship. Accept and you shall be known as Friend of Friends!
You will not regret this decision.
You will rue the day you turned you back on Darius!
I declare you fit to stand by my side. What say you? Shall we be allies?
I heard reports of a great swarm of fleas gathering near Persian lands. Turns out they were your troops. Remove them at once or I shall do it myself.
Agreeable.
I say... no!
Oh, I'm sorry did you say something? I tend to tune out the whines of sniveling cowards...
You stain the earth with your wretched incompetence! The world would rejoice were your civilization to vanish like a snowflake in the desert heat! (Denounces You.)
You are beneath me, son of a donkey driver! I shall crush you!
Your greed and ineptness leaves me little choice: prepare for war!
We'll call it a tie, shall we?
Such cowardice only serves to motivate me more! Soon, all that will remain of your civilization is ash!
I think our little spat has achieved its goals don't you think? Perhaps it's time for a brief respite before our inevitable rematch.
Curse you! The blood of the greatest leader in world history is on your hands!
Curse you! The blood of the greatest leader in world history is on your hands!
King of Kings
Respects those experiencing Golden Ages. Looks down upon those in Dark Ages.
(You are in a Dark Age.)
Darius is disgusted that your Civilization is in a Dark Age.
(You are in a Golden Age.)
Darius is impressed that your Civilization is in a Golden Age.
Your civilization is an astounding sight to see! Truly, your rule has brought an age of prosperity unto your people.
See how your people wallow in the filth of your incompetence! Your civilization lives in the shadow of your failures!
